name: Tweet Planner in Notion
description: Are you looking for a better way to plan out your tweets in advance? It's time to take control of your tweeting strategy and start seeing real results.Introducing the Tweet Planner!This Notion template that makes it easy to plan out your tweets and track your performance. Schedule your tweets according to different formats (listicle, opinion, tip, curation, etc.) and you'll eventually build up a library of content.Metrics: input your main metrics and you'll get a leaderboard of your best perform
features: Schedule your tweets according to different formats (listicle, opinion, tip, curation, etc.) and you'll eventually build up a library of content.; Metrics: input your main metrics and you'll get a leaderboard of your best performing content, which you can then remix and republish.; Calendar view to get a clear overview of what's going out on which day and provide a sense of achievement when you fill in every square; Summaries: you can create reports highlighting different metrics such as Likes, Impressions or Engagement; Video walkthrough & FAQ
